Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 一支手電筒，巡邏時應該需要用得上吧。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一支手电筒，巡逻时应该需要用得上吧。
English (United States)(en-US): A flashlight could come in handy.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 怎麼有口香糖？而且還是沒打開過包裝的，先收起來吧。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 怎么有口香糖？而且还是没打开过包装的，先收起来吧。
English (United States)(en-US): Why is there chewing gum? The package is sealed, so I'll take it.
Grab this to take to the drunk.
